text: Erich Wolfgang Korngold (May 29, 1897 - November 29, 1957) was an Austrian- born American composer and conductor. == Early years == Korngold was born to Jewish family in Br√ºnn, Austria-Hungary. == Personal life == In 1924, Korngold married Luzi von Sonnenthal. == Death == Korngold died in Los Angeles. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1897 births Category:1957 deaths Category:American movie score composers Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Erich Wolfgang Korngold
